_xResult.title: Winter Is Never Coming Oversized Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Handmade wool coat with natural stone buttons
_xResult.longdesc:
This minimalist mid-length wool jacket is high quality handmade clothing. You can choose from many colors for this elegant coat or buy it in gray as pictured. The removable inside decorative collar snaps on and off easily and can be a different color of your choosing. That way, you have two looks for the same price! Wear the inside collar up or down.

 

Aiste Anaite is a master of fiber arts and crafts her dress, jackets and coats with love and skill. Handmade from 60% wool and 40% viscose fabric. Made to order special for You and your dimensions including plus size. 

 

Asite says: "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique "textured" cloth. Once this is complete, I begin to design my clothing . Another technique that I use is a distinctive, never-to-be-repeated embroidered artscape onto fabric which is then sewn into reversible linen jackets, linen coats . My goal is to establish a mutually harmonious relationship with my clients while designing individual pieces for them. This special bond between an artist and her muse is inspiring as it stimulates and motivates creative energy. My inherent intuition helps to maintain this connection; I want people to trust me and give me the freedom to create an image for them. I have developed a distinctive "fit to size" technique that allows a customer quick access to new models and designs. Each and every client is a riddle that I must solve -- I adore this aspect of my work.

 

Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly-wherever you go may simply pack them to your travel bag-no additional ironing is needed before you wear this coat dress for women . Choose the first your eyes stop on and you simply look special! Like to browse the whole shop :)

 

With Love, Aiste
